1596497359_12kkzRK2n9vRvQLcycbGZNsD3vqzW.body:
I've recently read a very interesting essay about why communism failed. 

Basically, it can be successful only if it happens in a society where the individuals, behaviours, the culture and the instutions are at an appropriate level of development. 
If these four fields of development are not aligned, it will end up tragically, because force will be used to impose it.

Here's the essay:
https://metamoderna.org/the-four-fields-of-development-and-why-communism-killed-100-million-people/
